etymology.description: 㚔(㚔) (handcuff) + 廾(廾) (pair of hands) -> releasing hands -> 目(目) (eye) added -> 睪
etymology.interpretation: The character originally depicted a handcuff 㚔 with a pair of hands 廾, symbolizing the concept of releasing. Over time, the eye radical 目 was added to the composition to denote selection or observation, reflecting its usage in contexts related to picking or releasing. This evolution highlights the relation between physical release and mental discernment.
